trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Pensacola
There were no other sightings in Pensacola on or around August 8th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving my truck down hickery hammock road on my way home from work,a quarter mile from my street i observed bright lights about a half of a mile ahead of me in the middle of the road ,after getting closer it looked like a circus tent and opon getting closer the shape of pyrmird became more visable to me.They were shaped like three pyrmirds with mirrors and glowing lights outlineing the objects.Two were hovering in the road about five feet above the road and the third was hovering about sixty to seventy feet to the right above the powerlines .My feelings during the encounter was at awl,I couldnt beleave what i was seeing and tried to figure out what it could be in the middle of no where .I then texted friends and family and them of my sighting ,four of whom beleive me . I then drew pictures of what i had seen .I lost sight of the objects when a on coming car was coming toward me behind them,before the car got to close to them they vanished through thin air,like cutting off a light switch.
Summary: three perfect pyrmirds surrounded by lights ,two hovered in the middle of the road ,and one hovered over the power lines to the far right of my veiw
